word_mean: 复原，恢复：恢复健康和力气

sentence.Network_en: Their recuperation was, on average, 40 percent quicker than typically expected.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的康复期平均比通常预期的快40%.

sentence.Network_en: Analysis on Sickness Status of 1149 Aviators during Recuperation.
sentence.Network_cn: 飞行员1149例疗养期间患病情况分析.

sentence.Network_en: The recuperation of period of time has been met for certain.
sentence.Network_cn: 一段时间的调理肯定会好的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2010年11月7日 - 大众汽车将全面引进蓝驱技术系列(BlueMotionTechnologies)中的启动-停车(Start-Stop)、再生制动能量回收(Recuperation)等技术,广泛应用到合资公司产品中。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Latin recuparatio(n-), from the verb recuperare (see recuperate)

entry.def: When you recuperate, you recover your health or strength after you have been ill or injured.

example.ex: I went away to the country to recuperate...
He is recuperating from a serious back injury.
example.tran: 他背部受了重伤，目前正在康复中。

means.word_mean: 1. gradual healing (through rest) after sickness or injury
